original_text: So Mephibosheth dwelt in Jerusalem: for he did eat continually at the king's table; and was lame on both his feet.
korean_text: 므비보셋이 항상 왕의 상에서 먹으므로 예루살렘에 사니라 그는 두 발을 다 절더라

sentences.original_text: for he did eat continually at the king's table
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 왕의 식탁에서 계속해서 음식을 먹었습니다

sentences.original_text: and was lame on both his feet
